Package org.restlet.ext.javamail Description

Integration with JavaMail 1.4 (POP3 and SMTP clients). JavaMail provides a platform-independent and protocol-independent framework to build mail and messaging applications.
Since:
Restlet 1.0
See Also:
JavaMail product page, User Guide - JavaMail extension
